page.title: 10RECREATION OPERA DANCE
page.content: The St.Patrick's Opera Group produces an annual light opera, well performed. The last three productions have been: Die Fledermaus,The Yoemen of the Guard,and The Merry Widow. There have always been a number of good choirs and choral societies. In the past they have on occasion combined to form a mass choir,as during the Festival of Britain(1952). The Minstrels is a male singing group much in demand for entertainments and with a wide reputation. Scottish and Irish dancing are still well practised,and prizes are won. Theatre is popular and has received a boost in the form of the Henderson Theatre which has been recently constructed in the Dykehead Community Centre,situated in an old school.
